definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]

sentences.english: There is also a Children's Corner in our zoo.
sentences.chinese: 动物园里还有个儿童乐园。

sentences.english: Once (he was)a worker , Pang Long now becomes a famous singer.
sentences.chinese: 庞龙曾经是个工人，现在变成一位著名的歌手。

sentences.english: In most cases, it is a good idea to include them.
sentences.chinese: 大部分情况下，把教育时间写进去是个好主意。

sentences.english: It turns out that you can be a committed nurse and have a social life.
sentences.chinese: 因为那可以证明你可以是个有社交生活的带罪护士。

sentences.english: 'And it's a better hiding-place than out here in the country.
sentences.chinese: 那儿是个比乡间更好的藏身的地方。
“莫里森是个很棒的球员，”布朗说。

sentences.english: You may dig a hole with a spade over there.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用铲正在正在边撅个坑。

sentences.english: We don't have any information from inside the plant.
sentences.chinese: 我们还没有任何来自核电站里面的消息，这是个问题。

sentences.english: He now lives in Germany with his wife Deling and their 2 children.
sentences.chinese: 他与太太得灵及他们的2个孩子目前旅居在德国。

sentences.english: The gunman notched up five victims on the handle of his gun.
sentences.chinese: 枪手在自己的枪柄上刻上5个受害者的记号。

sentences.english: I am a European, and one returns to one's roots .
sentences.chinese: 我是个欧洲人，总要叶落归根。

sentences.english: For Clarissa, the entree is just the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 对克拉丽莎来说，主菜只是是个开头。

sentences.english: Tom's friend said he was a double-tongued liar.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆的朋友说他是个两面三刀的骗子。

sentences.english: One in 3 domestic passengers chooses China Southern Airlines on average.
sentences.chinese: 中国平均每3个民航旅客就有1个选择南航。

definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
